author: Reuters Editorial
title: Egypt's foreign inflows at $120 billion since 2016 pound float- Cbank head to paper
text:
CAIRO, May 14 (Reuters) - Egypt’s Central Bank Governor said foreign inflows reached $120 billion since its pound currency was floated in November 2016, state newspaper Al-Ahram Quote: d him as saying on Monday.
Tarek Amer also said Egypt would make a debt payment of $850 million to international oil companies, without specifying when. (Reporting by Ehab Farouk)
